text: The 1987 Vuelta a España was the 42nd edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in Benidorm, with a prologue individual time trial on 23 April, and Stage 11 occurred on 4 May with a stage to the Lakes of Covadonga. The race finished in Madrid on 14 May. ==Prologue== 23 April 1987 — Benidorm to Benidorm, (ITT) {| |Prologue result and general classification after Prologue {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank !
